text: Gu mbaram guma mbe kamthooŋ mbararagim, ana Hevenan kav kaav, khaŋ nzuai, “Nde khaŋ muuŋgip kha buni khergiri, ‘Ntige gum zumgum mba guigira Guma Bakɨme khothɨgap vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe zazera mbara muuŋgip, ndikndigɨri.’ ” Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar vhɨra ne nzuai, “Mbe guigira ndikndigɨri. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mbe mba mbui ŋaara mbatɨk, mbe ana thav, mbe vhuksuri. Mbe fhura ŋgɨrga fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe mba muuŋgi tɨvir vhuuiŋ, nta vhɨra mbe phorgɨp ŋgɨrga.”
